entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening and risk of a thunderstorm. Clearing this evening. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 4 May 2023
